ovdesc.p: This table used to maintain the required details for NSF processiong like Cut Off date,Return Method ,Charges and Version Id

desc.p: This field hold the values cut off date in the format 0W,1W,2W for NSF records processing through service.
This field holds the return type whether it is Pay All or Pay None.
This field holds the PGM.VERSION which will be used by the service to process the transaction i.e in IHLD
Should contain only the version name and not the application
e.x., this field should contain INPUT if version name to be used is FUNDS.TRANSFER,INPUT
This field holds override ids ,if the transaction gets the mentioned override then it will be store in USRETL.NSF.DETAILS with REASON CODE as NSF
If other override occured it will be marked as OTHERS
This field holds the charge limit for the UDP transactions per day.
This field holds the charge limit for the ODP transactions per day
This field holds the charge limit for the NSF transactions per day
This field holds the channels through which the transaction can come through NSF
This field holds a valid override id or a override message
This field holds a return code which should be sent back to the interface raising the transaction
This field holds a default return code which should be used when the override from transaction is not mapped to a specific reason code
